product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Smaller bottle than I’d thought, but this tint has SOOO much pigment! I used three tiny dots as blush and it was too much. On my complexion, one dab per cheek is just enough. Layers beautifully on the lips. The colour is gorgeous, like a juicy strawberry! New favourite.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content:
Comfortable on the lips, definitely dries fast as the other reviews has stated and can be a bit drying (I just stick a clear gloss over top). Makes a wonderful gradient lip if you're into that. Lasts a fair amount of time but I do find I have to reapply. Colour is definitely a bright red. The bottle is small but I can still see this lasting a while. A little goes a long way on the cheeks. If you put a small dab on the tip/underside of your nose it creates a really cute just-out-of-the-cold look!
…read more

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: Love that it dose not dry my lip and I love the formula. The color and packaging is so cute.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: The shade is pretty but I don’t feel like it stays on more than a few mins. I have normal/combo skin so I’m not sure why but I’d rather buy a blush stick or a cream blush that stays on longer

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: It blushes the way I like. Does not stay on for hours like it said though. Sometimes when I dab it on my the mark stays there so I guess it dries quickly? Not sure. Just ok.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Love the colour, however smudges very easily and didn’t last long :(

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: A little goes a long way!! Very nice natural look, I blend it with a brush. Light finish and doesn’t break me out.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium']
review_content: I would not use this as a lip stain since it is very dry. I used is a couple of times and my lips are insanely dry now. Works ok as a cheek tint. Not very impressed though. I ordered online so I can't even return

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Very pigmented and the new applicator makes it easier to apply on the lips than their other tints with the brush applicator. The formula is also a little thicker than the original Benetint. Fast drying but the tint doesn't dry out the lips. I like to dab a few dots and then I use my finger to spread out the rest of the product on my lips.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Oily']
review_content: I love this! you need to be really careful not to over-apply it to cheeks. I tend to put it on my hand, then a brush, then my cheek. It stays fairly well on the lips. amazing color on lips. I'm fair-skinned cool-toned.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: Much better than benetint for lip color. Blendable enough not to be a crazy cheek color if you only use a dot (I'm very pale).

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This is the best formula benefit has put on their stains. Love this. Color is vibrant and a little goes a long way!! More color additions in this formula please benefit!

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Benefit, what have you done to Benetint?? I used to use the original Benetint twenty years ago. Loved it but I stopped because it really wasn't the right color for me, too pinky purpley. So excited to finally get a red lip stain. This stuff stings, dries out your lips, barely stains them, and gets red on your teeth, cups, anything you touch. Massive disappointment.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: It’s a step higher (more pigment) then Benetint. A little goes a long way.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Normal']
review_content: This is one of the best stains I've ever used. It has great color control. The more layers applied the intensity of the red increases. You can have a subtle or dramatic look. Doesn't dry the skin or lips. Looks fabulous under a lip gloss without losing the color. Application can last hours.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I have a love affair with benetint for the last 8 years. I was so excited to buy this new love tint and I’m freaking obsessed.its the prettiest pink shade. I am in love. It mixes well with my nude glosses and gives a peachy pink shade when I mix. I’m in love with the love tint it’s everything.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: So pretty and buildable! This looks like it would be a universal tint. Smells kinda nice too. I like it on my cheeks as it seems drying on my lips.

product_name: Benefit Cosmetics Lovetint Lip & Cheek Stain
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: No way- stay away from this product. It’s a waste of money. One of the gals helped me out in the benefit section, applied this product on me, and I ended up looking like asian Ronald Macdonald- not cute. Also, it took a long time to take off... wouldn’t purchase this, ever
